attributes.action: golden shares for the people in newpower stations
attributes.additional_details: surely if the customers and tax payer has to finance new power stations and green energy they should have a share in the business or control over future price rises this was not the idea when these power stations were sold and privatised it was understood that these companies were required to raise finance to maintain and build new power stations under normal circumstances these people would have built in these costs in their kilowatt hour price or has the business model changed so much?.
